title: Ethereum Whale Dormant for One Year Begins Selling Off Its Coins As ETH Loses Steam: Lookonchain - The Daily Hodl
summary:
Here is a summary of the article in less than 256 tokens:

A large Ethereum (ETH) whale that was dormant for one year has started selling its coins on decentralized exchange platforms (DEX), causing a drop in ETH price. The whale has sold 18,865 ETH worth $2,229 each, with 5,588 ETH ($12.5 million) left. Chainlink (LINK) deposits worth $119 million have been made into Binance, with a history of deposits coinciding with price increases. A Solana-based (SOL) memecoin, Bonk (BONK), saw a trader lose $46,000 on November 1st but make $4.4 million on December 15th after buying and depositing the asset on DEX.

title: How High Will Ethereum Go in 2024: Watch These ETH Price Predictions by Experts - CryptoPotato
summary: Ethereum (ETH) is expected to reach new heights in 2024, with some experts predicting a rise to $5,000 or $8,000 by the end of 2026. Analysts point to the asset's bullish trend and upcoming upgrades, such as "Protodanksharding" (EIP-4844), as drivers of growth. However, some bearish perspectives, such as those of trader Peter Brandt, suggest that Ethereum may not be a viable long-term investment due to its functionality and gas prices.

title: ChatGPT thinks Ethereum to $10,000 by 2024 is very likely - AMBCrypto News
summary:
Sure, here's a summary of the article in less than 256 tokens:

Ethereum's price is up 1.96% in the past week, trading at $2,287. The "Merge" event has shifted the blockchain from Proof-of-Work to Proof-of-Stake, reducing energy consumption by 99% and global electricity consumption by 0.2%. Vitalik Buterin's 5-step roadmap includes sharding, verifying transactions, and optimizing data storage. ChatGPT predicts Ethereum could reach $10,000 by 2024, but it's important to do your own research before investing.

title: Ethereum Price Prediction: Will Santa Claus Rally Push ETH Higher? - Bankless Times
summary: Ethereum (ETH) price has retreated from its year-to-date high of $2,402 due to a dovish tone from the Federal Reserve, which has led to a decrease in investor interest. Despite this, the coin remains above a key support level of $2,140 and has shown bullish signs, such as breaking above 50-day and 100-day Exponential Moving Averages (EMA) and pointing downwards in the Relative Strength Index (RSI) and Stochastic Oscillator. The article predicts that ETH could bounce back and retest the YTD high of $2,402 during the Santa Claus rally.

title: Mapping Ethereum’s prediction as whales rally to save prices - AMBCrypto News
summary:
Here is a summary of the article in less than 256 tokens:

Ethereum (ETH) prices have been declining, but whales are accumulating more ETH. Data from CoinMarketCap and Santiment shows that whale activity has increased, with top addresses holding more ETH. However, the RSI and stochastic are neutral, and liquidation heatmap shows an increase in liquidation near $2,140-$2,170. It's possible that ETH's price could drop to this level before a bull rally, but a further downtrend is also possible in the near term.

title: Ethereum Can Surge To $5k, Analysts Lean Heavily On This Promising Meme Coin - Crypto News Flash
summary: Ethereum (ETH) is targeting a $5K surge, while NuggetRush (NUGX) gains attention as a promising meme coin. Ethereum has been a top crypto for years, with a strong system for developers to create blockchain-based projects. NuggetRush combines meme coin fun with smart features like P2E gaming and NFT Staking, with a strong presale performance. Analysts favor NuggetRush for its potential.
